root.name: Root
root.description: Root component for the Progress component.

prop.name: value
prop.info_tooltips: The current value of the progress bar, clamped between minValue and maxValue.

prop.name: minValue
prop.info_tooltips: The minimum value of the progress bar.

prop.name: maxValue
prop.info_tooltips: The maximum value of the progress bar.

prop.name: customRootClass
prop.info_tooltips: Custom root class name to override default styling.

indicator.name: Indicator
indicator.description: Indicator component for the Progress component.

prop.name: asChild
prop.info_tooltips: If true, the component will render its children as a child of the component.

features: Displays completion status visually as a horizontal bar
Supports minimum and maximum value configuration
